channel.title: I need help with I Pk Girls 554 client
channel.description: I have downloaded the I Pk girls client, cache, and source and I got the server running but I need help with the client. I put the 554cache into my drive C:\ and I tried running the client and it comes up loading and gets stuck on the part that says "connecting to update server". Can anyone farmiliar with this source please help me. I know that all of my paths are set right.

item.title: I need help with I Pk Girls 554 client

I have downloaded the I Pk girls client, cache, and source and I got the server running but I need help with the client. Can anyone farmiliar with this source please help me. I know that all of my paths are set right.
